name: 2D Platformer FINAL (miznerco)
description:
2D Platform Final 

Modifications:

1. I added 2 new levels also with editing level 1

2. I changed the background look, how the enemies look, the enemies health.

3. I added score pickups, check points, and health picks ups, and moving platforms  throughout 

4. I changed the way the player jump so it is not as high 

5. I also allowed the player to beat each level in 2 different ways!

6. Finally, I changed the colors of every pause, win, lose, and main menus!
